{-# LANGUAGE DeriveDataTypeable #-}
{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}

module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Struct.Half.HalfRelmap
( -- * Relmap implementation
  makeConsRelmap
, ConsRelmap (..)
, RelmapImplement (..)
, RelmapParser
  -- * Half constructor
, HalfRelmap (HalfRelmap)
, ConsHalfRelmap
, consHalfRelmap
  -- * Full constructor
, ConsFullRelmap
, consFullRelmap
) where
import Data.Generics
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Struct.Full.Relmap
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Syntax
import Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Abort



-- ----------------------  Relmap implementation

-- | Make half and full relmap constructors.
makeConsRelmap
    :: [RelmapImplement v]  -- ^ Implementations of relmap operator
    -> (ConsRelmap v)       -- ^ Relmap constructors
makeConsRelmap = make . unzip . map split where
    split (RelmapImplement n half full usage) =
        ((n, (usage, half)), (n, full))
    make (halfs, fulls) = let half = makeConsHalfRelmap halfs
                              full = makeConsFullRelmap fulls
                          in ConsRelmap half full

-- | Half and full relmap constructor
data ConsRelmap v = ConsRelmap
    { consHalf :: ConsHalfRelmap
    , consFull :: ConsFullRelmap v
    }

instance Show (ConsRelmap v) where
    show _ = "ConsRelmap half full"

-- | Implementation of relmap operator.
--   It consists of (1) operator name,
--   (2) operand parser, (3) full constructor,
--   and (4) usage of operator.
data RelmapImplement v = RelmapImplement
    String              -- Operator name
    RelmapParser        -- Operand parser
    (ConsFullRelmap v)  -- Relmap full constructor
    [String]            -- Description of operator usage

-- | Parser for operand of relational operator.
--   This parsers docompose operand trees,
--   and give a name to suboperand.
type RelmapParser = [TokenTree] -> [(String, [TokenTree])]



-- ----------------------  Half construction

-- | Intermediate data that represents use of relmap operator.
--   It consists of (1) operator name as 'String',
--   (2) usage of operator as list of 'String',
--   (3) its operands as list of 'RelmapOperand',
--   and (4) subrelmaps in operands as list of 'HalfRelmap'.
data HalfRelmap
    = HalfRelmap
      String                  -- Operator name
      [String]                -- Usages
      [(String, [TokenTree])] -- Operand
      [HalfRelmap]            -- Subrelmaps in operand
      deriving (Show, Data, Typeable)

-- | First step of relmap construction,
--   make 'HalfRelmap' from use of relational operator.
type ConsHalfRelmap
    =  String         -- ^ Operator name
    -> [TokenTree]    -- ^ Operand as source trees
    -> HalfRelmap     -- ^ Result half relmap with empty subs

makeConsHalfRelmap
    :: [(String, ([String], [TokenTree] -> [(String, [TokenTree])]))]
       -- ^ [(op, (usage, half))]
    -> ConsHalfRelmap
makeConsHalfRelmap halfs op opd =
    case lookup op halfs of
      Just (usage, half) -> HalfRelmap op usage (half opd) []
      Nothing -> HalfRelmap op [] [("operand", opd)] []

-- | Construct half relmaps from source trees.
consHalfRelmap :: ConsHalfRelmap -> [TokenTree] -> HalfRelmap
consHalfRelmap half = loop where
    joint :: TokenTree
    joint = Bloom $ Word 0 "|"  -- non-quoted vertical stroke

    loop :: [TokenTree] -> HalfRelmap
    loop xs = case divideBy joint xs of
                [x] -> one x
                xs2 -> halfJoint $ map loop xs2

    loop' :: TokenTree -> HalfRelmap
    loop' x = loop [x]

    one :: [TokenTree] -> HalfRelmap
    one [Branch _ xs] = loop xs
    one (Bloom (Word 0 op) : opd) = fill $ half op opd
    one opd = HalfRelmap "?" [] [("operand", opd)] []

    fill :: HalfRelmap -> HalfRelmap
    fill h@(HalfRelmap op usage xs _) =
        case lookup "relmap" xs of
          Just ms -> HalfRelmap op usage xs $ map loop' ms
          Nothing -> h  -- no subrelmaps

divideBy :: (Eq a) => a -> [a] -> [[a]]
divideBy dv = loop where
    loop xs = case break (== dv) xs of
                (x, _ : xs2) -> x : loop xs2
                (x, [])      -> [x]

halfJoint :: [HalfRelmap] -> HalfRelmap
halfJoint = HalfRelmap "|" ["RELMAP | RELMAP"] []



-- ----------------------  Full construction

-- | Second step of relmap synthesis,
--   make 'Relmap' from contents of 'HalfRelmap'.
type ConsFullRelmap v
    =  String          -- ^ Operator name from 'HalfRelmap'
    -> [(String, [TokenTree])] -- ^ Operands from 'HalfRelmap'
    -> [Relmap v]      -- ^ Subrelmaps computed by 'consFullRelmap'
    -> AbortOr (Relmap v) -- ^ Result relmap

makeConsFullRelmap :: [(String, ConsFullRelmap v)] -> ConsFullRelmap v
makeConsFullRelmap fulls n = 
    case lookup n fulls of
      Just full -> full n
      Nothing   -> \_ _ -> Right $ RelmapName n

-- | Construct (full) relmap.
consFullRelmap :: ConsFullRelmap v -> HalfRelmap -> AbortOr (Relmap v)
consFullRelmap full = loop where
    loop (HalfRelmap n usage args subs)
        = do ms <- mapM loop subs
             addAbort (AbortUsage usage) $ full n args ms
